original: Bäckner, Axel Edvin, kontraktsprost, Mellerud, f. 9/5/84 i Färgelan-da, Älvsb. 1., av Lars Petter Olsson o. Maja Stina Eriksson. G. 14 m. Karin Lindeberg. Barn: Maj f. 16, Rut 18, Per-Axel 24. — Mog:ex. i Vänersborg 06, teol. fil. ex. 07, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov, prästv. f. Karlstads stift samt folksk :lär :ex. 10. Past:adj. o. v. pastor i Sillerud 10, kommin. i Ör 11, pred. v. Kroppefjälls sanat. 17, kyrkoh. i Holm 29, pred. v. vårdhemm. i Mellerud 32, kontr :prost i S. Dals kontr. sed. 38. Led. av styr. f. Dalsl. folkhögsk. 26, v. ordf. 33, insp. f. Mel-leruds komm. mellansk. 27, suppl. i kyrkomötet 29, 36, 38, 41 o. 46, led. av stiftsrådet 35, suppl. i domkap. 37, led. 41, presies v. prästmöte 47. Skr.: präsit-möteisavh., predikn., tal o. upps. LVO.
translated: Bäckner, Axel Edvin, Rural Dean, Mellerud, born May 9th, 1884 in Färgelanda, Älvsborg County, son of Lars Petter Olsson and Maja Stina Eriksson. Married to Karin Lindeberg on the 14th of a certain month in 19xx. Children: Maj born in 1916, Rut in 1918, Per-Axel in 1924. Bachelor of Law (LL.B) in Vänersborg in 1906, Bachelor of Theology (B.Th) in 1907, Master of Theology (M.Th) in 1910, ordained as priest in the diocese of Karlstad, and received a teaching certification in 1910. Assistant Pastor and Deputy Pastor in Sillerud in 1910, Curate in Ör in 1911, Preacher in Kroppefjäll's sanatorium in 1917, Vicar in Holm in 1929, Preacher in nursing homes in Mellerud in 1932, Rural Dean in South Dals County from 1938. Member of the Board of Dalsland Folk High School since 1926, Vice-Chairman in 1933, Inspector for Mellerud School District from 1927, Deputy at the Church Assembly in 1929, 1936, 1938, 1941, and 1946, Member of the Diocesan Council in 1935, Deputy in the Cathedral Chapter in 1937, Member in 1941, President of the Clergy Meeting in 1947. Author of sermons, speeches, and essays. Also, he was awarded as Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa.

award.name: Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa
